conv_purpose: User aims to create a comprehensive and structured article on the latest automotive technologies for a professional industry publication.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User asks for a detailed overview of the latest automotive technologies that have been introduced in the past year.
summarized prompts.explanation: This initial prompt establishes the main theme of the conversation, which aligns with the user's purpose of gathering information for a professional article.

conv_task: Professional Writing: Writing tasks that require domain-specific knowledge or a formal style.

conv_purpose: The user aims to create a detailed report on the principles of quantum mechanics with an emphasis on their application in modern technology.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user requests an overview of the basic principles of quantum mechanics and their historical development.
summarized prompts.explanation: In this first round, the user sets the groundwork by asking for a broad overview to establish the main topic of quantum mechanics.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by asking for a deeper explanation of how quantum superposition is utilized in modern computing.
summarized prompts.explanation: In the second round, the user follows up on the initial overview by focusing on a specific principle (quantum superposition) and its technological applications, continuing the dialogue in a focused direction.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by inquiring about the impact of quantum entanglement on data encryption and security systems.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt follows up on the previous round by advancing the user's exploration into specific applications of quantum mechanics, specifically in the domain of data security.

conv_task: Professional Writing: Writing tasks that require domain-specific knowledge or a formal style.

conv_purpose: The user aims to gather comprehensive and formal information on the impact of industrial processes on the environment to craft a professional report.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user requests an analysis of the general impact of industrial processes on the environment.
summarized prompts.explanation: This is the initial round of dialogue where the user establishes the main topic of interest.

conv_task: Professional Writing: Writing tasks that require domain-specific knowledge or a formal style.

conv_purpose: The user aims to create a comprehensive and professionally written article about the future trends in artificial intelligence for a technology magazine.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user requests an introduction to the current trends and potential future developments in artificial intelligence, specifically for a technology-focused article.
summarized prompts.explanation: This initial prompt sets the stage for an informative piece about AI, aligning with the characteristics of 'Clear Purpose Dialogue' by having a focused and defined goal.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the scope from last round's prompt to require data-backed insights on how these AI trends might impact specific industries, aiming for a more data-centric perspective.
summarized prompts.explanation: This follows the 'Refinement' structure by narrowing the focus to include specific industries and emphasizing the need for data support, refining the user's initial inquiry.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the tone of the previous request to make it more suitable for publication in a technology magazine, asking for a more polished and formal style.
summarized prompts.explanation: This is another 'Refinement' structure, where the user adjusts the tone and style to meet publication standards, ensuring the article is appropriately polished for a professional audience.

conv_task: Professional Writing: Writing tasks that require domain-specific knowledge or a formal style.

conv_purpose: The user seeks to write a formal legal opinion on a specific case, gathering detailed legal frameworks and precedents through a structured dialogue.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user requests an overview of the legal principles relevant to a breach of contract case.
summarized prompts.explanation: The initial prompt sets the topic and asks for foundational information, aligning with the start of a structured dialogue.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows up by asking for examples of precedential cases in breach of contract that illustrate these principles.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt follows the 'follow-up' structure by building on the information from the first round and requesting more detailed, related information.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user follows up by inquiring about potential defenses against a breach of contract claim under similar circumstances.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt again follows the 'follow-up' structure by further narrowing the focus based on the previous information, adding constraints to address potential defenses.

conv_task: Professional Writing: Writing tasks that require domain-specific knowledge or a formal style.
